title: 820-00840 no brain
message: Hey, another board with no brain, board takes 20.17v, 0.150A-0-300A but no power, and if i connect the battery  it goes to 2A but no picture internal or external. trackpad clicking and display tested with another working board. where to start?

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
Check for USB activity.
How is changing PPVCCCPU_S0G in the first 10-15s?

title: 820-00840 no brain
message: PPVCCCPU_S0G 10-15s 0-0.3mv

title: 820-00840 no brain
message: USB activity, phone chargingvia port

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
Imposible to get USB activity, if no CPU core voltage present!
Do not confuse between USB power and activity.
We explained lot of times here how to test for USB ACTIVITY.

Try known good BIOS, clean ME.

message: mac wont go dfu either

title: 820-00840 no brain

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
What DFU, it doesn't have T2 chip...

So you get voltage at L7210/20 with battery alone, but no voltage with charger only?

title: 820-00840 no brain
message: no voltage with charger only-

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
That is very strange, because there should be no voltage with battery alone, untill press the power button.

With charger alone, which coils get voltage?

title: 820-00840 no brain
message: every other coils are good exept, l7210,l7220,l8030 theese are without battery 0v

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
There is something strange, please check again L7210/20 voltage:
- with charger alone; not pulsing in first seconds?
- with battery alone; do not press power button.
- with charger and battery, both present.

CPU core voltage should not appear on battery alone, before pressing power button.

title: 820-00840 no brain
message: cpu core 0-0.3 pulsing, i was wrong with battery and without battery

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
So no steady 1.8V at L7210/20 in any case?
Board should start with aprox 1V and drops to 0.6V when boots.

Is there cycling pulse?
Other big coils get steady voltage?
Did you try to start in SMC bypass mode?

title: 820-00840 no brain
message:
L7210/20 steady 0-0.3v with battery and without 
L7310/30 1.8v with battery. 0v without battery

No cycling pulse
Other big coils get steady voltage
smc bypass not working
